Is Verus a closed, proprietary system controlled by a single entity?

No, Verus is not a closed, proprietary system controlled by a single entity. It's an open, community-driven model that enables it to be a decentralized financial network. This openness and community-driven approach allow Verus to operate in a credibly neutral and rent-free manner.
